bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I make something sweet!
🐝 I have stripes of yellow and black.
🌸 I help plants make seeds.

bug.question: I build my home in a group. I march in a line and carry food. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small but strong.
🌿 I live underground in colonies.
☀️ I work very hard all day.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then spin a cocoon, and finally sprout wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I am a symbol of transformation.
🐛 I eat lots of leaves when I'm young.
🌈 I can be many different colors.

bug.question: I'm red with black spots, and said to bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 Farmers like me because I eat other bugs.
⚫ I have a shiny shell with spots.
🌱 I am often found on plants.

bug.question: I jump very high, and my legs are very strong. I like to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I can make a chirping sound by rubbing my legs together.
🌿 I am usually green or brown.
🐸 Some animals like to eat me.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I am often found in corners of rooms or outside.
🕷️ Some people are scared of me.
🐛 I eat insects that get caught in my home.

bug.question: I am a nocturnal bug that loves the bright lights and sometimes bumps into walls. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I only come out at night.
💡I am attracted to lamps and porch lights.
🦋 People often confuse me with a butterfly.

bug.question: I chirp loudly on summer nights and spend most of my life underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 Only the males sing.
🌳 My singing helps me attract a mate.
📅 Some of my kind only emerge every 17 years.

bug.question: I am known for carrying a shell and leaving a slimy trail. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am often found in gardens eating plants.
🐌 Some cultures eat me as a delicacy.
🏠 I can retract my body into my hard covering for safety.

bug.question: I am an insect that pretends to be a twig, helping me to blend into trees and avoid predators. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 My camouflage is very effective.
🌳 I primarily feed on leaves.
🌿 My body resembles a small branch.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.
💧 I use my trunk to drink.

animal.question: I meow and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk.
🐈 I purr when I'm happy.

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I protect your house.
🎾 I enjoy fetching.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 People often feed me bread.
🦆 I have webbed feet.
🥚 I lay eggs.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane.
🥩 I am a carnivore.
🐾 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I hop and have a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat plants.
🇦🇺 I'm from Australia.
🦘 I carry my baby in my pouch.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🐭 I sometimes eat mice.
🌿 Some of my kind are venomous.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I am related to a horse.
🌿 I eat grass.
🦁 Lions like to hunt me.

animal.question: I am a bird that can't fly but loves to swim and waddle. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I live in a very cold place.
🐟 I eat fish.
🐧 I am black and white.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change my color.
🐚 I eat crabs and shellfish.
🌊 I squirt ink when I am scared.
